name: Presidents
description: The presidents lead the club, sourcing opportunities for students, setting the vision for GRC, and running most meetings for the team and board.

name: Vice Presidents
description: Vice Presidents head individal efforts, leading the club's curriculum design, external relations, internal opportunities, consulting groups, and finances.

name: Project Leads
description: The project leads each work closely with clients to ensure a successful experience both for the consultants and the companies they advise.

members.name: Adam Sutter
members.projects: Global Center for Maritime Decarbonization, Global Delta Capital

members.name: Frank Ma
members.projects: Global Center for Maritime Decarbonization, Global Delta Capital

name: Consultants
description: The consultants are the heart of GRC, providing well-researched and exhaustive solutions to the variety of issues companies bring to us.
